scripts.minify: uglifyjs script.js -o script.js -c -m && uglifyjs utils/color-converters.js -o utils/color-converters.js -c -m && uglifyjs service-worker.js -o service-worker.js -c -m
scripts.build-zip-windows: del colorpal.zip && npm run build && powershell -Command "& {New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path ..\temp; Copy-Item -Path * -Destination ..\temp -Recurse -Exclude node_modules, .git, .github, images, .gitignore, package.json, package-lock.json, readme.md, *.js.map, *.ts, tsconfig.json; Compress-Archive -Path ..\temp\* -DestinationPath colorpal.zip -Force; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ..\temp}"
scripts.build-zip-unix: rm colorpal.zip; npm run build && zip -r colorpal.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' '.git/*' '*.zip' 'images/*'
